body_html: FYI, if I use AddControlInput from python_api.h and then export to GraphDef and create a new graph from that GraphDef, the control dependencies work fine. This makes me think that something needs to be added after the call to Graph::AddControlEdge, but I'm not sure what yet.
body_text: FYI, if I use AddControlInput from python_api.h and then export to GraphDef and create a new graph from that GraphDef, the control dependencies work fine. This makes me think that something needs to be added after the call to Graph::AddControlEdge, but I'm not sure what yet.
body: FYI, if I use `AddControlInput` from `python_api.h` and then export to `GraphDef` and create a new graph from that `GraphDef`, the control dependencies work fine. This makes me think that something needs to be added after the call to `Graph::AddControlEdge`, but I'm not sure what yet.
